title: USG Entitlement Token Response
description: Schema for the response returned by the USG /entitlements/issue endpoint.

entitlement_token.description: Opaque token string (e.g., JWT or similar) representing a time-limited entitlement.

expires.description: UTC expiration time for the entitlement.

event_id.description: Optional echo of the event identifier associated with this entitlement.

scope.description: Optional list of scopes attached to this entitlement.
